name: Fighty Friends Online
description:
Dear Twitch Streamers,

Do you feel like playing a co-op game with your stream for approximately 30 minutes?

In Fighty Friends Online, you use Twitch chat to collectively guide your virtual peanut boy through a world filled with monsters, knowledge, and goodies! Fighty Friends Online is a massively multiplayer virtual pet RPG, allowing any number of your viewers to vote on the main character's actions. Defeat enemies, learn secret commands, and level up with your audience to decide on how our hero interacts with skeleton pirates, fanny packs, volcano demons, safety scissors, math, and more! 

Just launch the game, and before play starts you will be prompted to enter your channel name. This will automatically connect the game to your channel's chatroom, and then you're ready to play : )

Best,

The Peanut Boyz

------------------------

Instructions:

  1. On the opening screen, enter in the name of your Twitch channel. For example "pigsquad".

  2. Use your Twitch stream's chat window to control the game.

Note: You do not actually have to stream the game to play : )

Programmed by: Mickey Sanchez
2D Art by: Will Lewis
Music by: Brendan McCracken
3D Art by: Daniel Chamberlain and Jake Jefferies

Created for PIGSquad's "Performance" Summer Slow Jam: #SSJperformance
